dict.acceptation: （表示态度）反对；（表示方位）紧靠着…；（表示对象）对…不利；以…兑换；

sent.orig: Label cutting is performed on the special roller by a rotary blade against a fixed blade.
sent.trans: 标签切割在特制辊上通过相对的转动刀片和固定刀片完成。此处的against如何解释比较好？

sent.orig: The trivalent vaccine against typetype 3 against type1 type one and highly effective against typetype 2.
sent.trans: 三价疫苗对于类型3病毒效果最差，类型1病毒效果稍好，对于类型2泽很有效。

sent.orig: Has not Christianity declaimed against private property, against marriage, against the State?
sent.trans: 基督教不是也激烈反对私有财产，反对婚姻，反对国家吗？

sent.orig: The civilization of the youth is that of struggle against one's background, against time against experience.
sent.trans: 青年之文明，奋斗之文明也，与境遇奋斗，与时代奋斗，与经验奋斗。

sent.orig: It's good against vehicles and structures but not so good against infantry.
sent.trans: 适合对抗车辆和建筑，不过不大适合对抗步兵。
